"A.P.238/4/8": "It seems that Huey's ARKS Championship is coming up."
"Looks like we have to pair up for someone with the event."
"Seems like good practice for working with a group."
"Since ARKS is all about teaming up to take on larger foes, it seems legit."
"But I'm kind of worried about my job. I mean look at me, does it look like I can afford a pay cut?"
"You seem pretty strong, if you don't mind me cramping your style, please invite me."
